text:
Berpalinglah padaNya, Wahai Kawan

When There is No One to Console You

Chorus:
When there is no one to console you;
And no one to even greet you;
Despair not, O Friend, turn to Him...

#covid19 #pandemic #clapping #vaccine #mentalhealth #meditation #handinhand #anandashram https://t.co/aN2Uce7wLo
